ygData.msgSnippet: You folks do know that annoying them to death is not likely to work very well, right?=) Not saying I disagree with you, but perhaps we need to go about this
ygData.messageBody:
You folks do know that annoying them to death is not likely to work very
well, right?=)

Not saying I disagree with you, but perhaps we need to go about this another
way than annoying the board admins with bumping
